description: Situated amid gently rolling hills, this restaurant with large picture windows boasts fine views of the surrounding countryside, which can be enjoyed even more from its summer terrace. For many years, the Leoni family have served Parma specialities here, including excellent salumi and recipes handed down by their grandmother, as well as typical mountain ingredients such as mushrooms and game.
